fomod.Name: IntelEngine
fomod.Author: Galanx
fomod.Description:
AI-powered NPC autonomy mod for Skyrim. Gives NPCs the ability to travel, perform tasks, and create dynamic story events powered by SkyrimNet's LLM integration.
Requirements: SKSE, SkyrimNet, PapyrusExtender (po3), PapyrusUtil, MCM Helper
